title: Kain Panjang (long Sarong), 1900–69
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: wax resist dyeing (batik) on plain weave
creditline: Gift of Camila Hewitt in memory of her grandfather, Edward Ringwood Hewitt
description: Batik long sarong (kain panjang) in blue and brown (indigo and soga-brown). Both "lar" (single wing of Garuda, mount of Vishnu) and "sawat" (double wing and tail of Garuda) motifs are used. Also contains stylized butterfly wings, caterpillars, and "ship of the dead" motif. On a foliate background of the "semen" group.

tombstone.epitaph:
Kain Panjang (long Sarong), 1900–69.
1900–69. Medium: cotton
Technique: wax resist dyeing (batik) on plain weave. Gift of Camila Hewitt in memory of her grandfather, Edward Ringwood Hewitt. 1969-141-1.
